content:
I just logged GF#17364 to fix all of the MedicinalProduct* examples because the examples are of AdverseEvent.
@Grahame Grieve can the build tooling be updated so it causes an error when a resource's example is not that same resource?
For example, look at:
medicinalproductauthorization-example
medicinalproductclinicals-example
medicinalproductdevicespec-example
medicinalproductingredient-example
medicinalproductpackaged-example
medicinalproductpharmaceutical-example
We wouldn't always want an error. However a suppressant warning might be a good idea. (Type might be Bundled or perhaps you want to show an example of a contained resource.)
I'll make it an error except for known cases (bundle)
Thanks @Grahame Grieve -- in the meantime, I am maintaining bogus MedicinalProduct* examples anytime I make updates to AdverseEvent
